me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.recipes

Interface CustomRecipe

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Recipe
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShapelessCustomRecipe, SimpleCustomRecipe

    public interface CustomRecipe
extends Recipe
    Represents a recipe which takes a defined length of time and a specific STB machine to process it.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSupplementaryResult(SupplementaryResult result)
      Add a supplementary result to this recipe.
      Collection<ItemStack> calculateSupplementaryResults()
      Perform a one-off calculation of the actual supplementary results for this recipe, based on the result chances.
      int getProcessingTime()
      Get the time in server ticks needed to make this recipe.
      String getProcessorID()
      Get the item ID of the STB machine which is used to make this recipe.
      Collection<SupplementaryResult> listSupplementaryResults()
      List the possible supplementary results from this recipe.
      String makeKey(boolean ignoreData)
      Construct a key for this recipe based on its ingredients, which uniquely identifies it, so that it can be efficiently looked up.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe

        getResult

    • Method Detail

      • getProcessingTime

        int getProcessingTime()
        Get the time in server ticks needed to make this recipe.
        Returns:
        the processing time, in ticks

      • getProcessorID

        String getProcessorID()
        Get the item ID of the STB machine which is used to make this recipe.
        Returns:
        the STB item ID

      • addSupplementaryResult

        void addSupplementaryResult(SupplementaryResult result)
                            throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Add a supplementary result to this recipe.
        Parameters:
        result - the supplementary result to add
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException

      • listSupplementaryResults

        Collection<SupplementaryResult> listSupplementaryResults()
        List the possible supplementary results from this recipe.
        Returns:
        a collection of supplementary results

      • calculateSupplementaryResults

        Collection<ItemStack> calculateSupplementaryResults()
        Perform a one-off calculation of the actual supplementary results for this recipe, based on the result chances. The return value of this method is likely to be different each time it is called, based on the defined result chances.
        Returns:
        a collection of item stacks

      • makeKey

        String makeKey(boolean ignoreData)
        Construct a key for this recipe based on its ingredients, which uniquely identifies it, so that it can be efficiently looked up.
        Parameters:
        ignoreData - if true, create a key without the items' data values
        Returns:
        a unique key string for this recipe
